Tributes flow after shock death of Gisborne waka ama greathttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/tributes-flow-after-shock-death-of-gisborne-waka-ama-great/USTM2HVVOZC6JKXGP6KKOLHVEQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/tributes-flow-after-shock-death-of-gisborne-waka-ama-great/USTM2HVVOZC6JKXGP6KKOLHVEQ/ Murray Robertson, John Gillies'Strong, staunch, smart, hearty, mentally tough and most of all, loyal!' The photo appeared on the back page of the Gisborne Herald, headined "Golden Kiwi". Waka ama great Campbell passed away in Gisborne at the weekend. Photo / Garrick Cameron
